Uses of Interface
org.vertx.java.core.net.NetClient

  • Packages that use NetClient 
    Package Description
    org.vertx.java.core  
    org.vertx.java.core.net  

    • Uses of NetClient in org.vertx.java.core

      Methods in org.vertx.java.core that return NetClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract NetClient Vertx.createNetClient()
      Create a TCP/SSL client

    • Uses of NetClient in org.vertx.java.core.net

      Methods in org.vertx.java.core.net that return NetClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetClient NetClient.connect(int port, Handler<NetSocket> connectCallback)
      Attempt to open a connection to a server at the specific port and host localhost The connect is done asynchronously and on success, a NetSocket instance is supplied via the connectHandler instance
      NetClient NetClient.connect(int port, java.lang.String host, Handler<NetSocket> connectHandler)
      Attempt to open a connection to a server at the specific port and host.
      NetClient NetClient.setBossThreads(int threads)
      Set the number of boss threads to use.
      NetClient NetClient.setConnectTimeout(long timeout)
      Set the connect timeout in milliseconds.
      NetClient NetClient.setKeyStorePassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      Set the password for the SSL key store.
      NetClient NetClient.setKeyStorePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to the SSL key store.
      NetClient NetClient.setReceiveBufferSize(int size)
      Set the TCP receive buffer size for connections created by this instance to size in bytes.
      NetClient NetClient.setReconnectAttempts(int attempts)
      Set the number of reconnection attempts.
      NetClient NetClient.setReconnectInterval(long interval)
      Set the reconnect interval, in milliseconds
      NetClient NetClient.setReuseAddress(boolean reuse)
      Set the TCP reuseAddress setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      NetClient NetClient.setSendBufferSize(int size)
      Set the TCP send buffer size for connections created by this instance to size in bytes.
      NetClient NetClient.setSoLinger(boolean linger)
      Set the TCP soLinger setting for connections created by this instance to linger.
      NetClient NetClient.setSSL(boolean ssl)
      If ssl is true, this signifies that any connections will be SSL connections.
      NetClient NetClient.setTCPKeepAlive(boolean keepAlive)
      Set the TCP keepAlive setting for connections created by this instance to keepAlive.
      NetClient NetClient.setTCPNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
      If tcpNoDelay is set to true then Nagle's algorithm will turned off for the TCP connections created by this instance.
      NetClient NetClient.setTrafficClass(int trafficClass)
      Set the TCP trafficClass setting for connections created by this instance to trafficClass.
      NetClient NetClient.setTrustAll(boolean trustAll)
      If you want an SSL client to trust *all* server certificates rather than match them against those in its trust store, you can set this to true.
      NetClient NetClient.setTrustStorePassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      Set the password for the SSL trust store.
      NetClient NetClient.setTrustStorePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to the SSL trust store.
